summary: Two terminally ill patients in a hospital yearn for relief from their predicament. With little or no friends, they form an uneasy alliance and plot an escape for one last wild time.
cast: Timothy Dalton|Anthony Edwards|Janet McTeer|Camille Coduri|Jill Bennett|Robert Lang|Pat Starr|Bruce Boa|Sheila Hancock|Geoffrey Palmer|Caroline Langrishe|Benjamin Whitrow|Robyn Moore|Connie Booth|Julie T.
